categories.title: Food and Drinks
categories.subtitle: Discover Lloret's diverse gastronomy and beverage offers

items.title: Bar Restaurant Las Regiones
items.shortDescription: In need of a hearty meal? Or maybe a quick expresso? Las Regiones meets both needs!
items.longDescription: Come taste traditional Spanish meals. From the world famous tapas and the refreshing sangria, to some local treats such as crema catalana or bunyols. You are sure to find something you like, immersed at all times in a friendly atmosphere

items.title: Beach Döner Kebab
items.shortDescription: Come try a selection of Eastern delicacies
items.longDescription: A lovely place by the main beach, featuring many famous dishes hailing from the MENA region, India and Pakistan

items.title: Cocktail Bar Cala Banys
items.shortDescription: Enjoy your cocktail surrounded by the majestic Mediterranean
items.longDescription: Cala Banys is a small cove near Lloret's central beach. This inlet remains hidden to most, since it is not as easily accessible as the main beaches. Whoever persists and reaches it will be awarded with magnificent vistas and a relaxed atmosphere

items.title: La Vaca Echada
items.shortDescription: An Argentinian Steakhouse located in the heart of Lloret's Historical Center
items.longDescription: This restaurant specializes in Argentina's most renowned culinary product: the Argentine beef. Charcoal-grilled with smoky undertones, this South American wonder is sure to win the hearts (and palates!) of the meat lovers out there

items.title: Pizzeria Anna
items.shortDescription: Taste the world's favourite fast food, reimagined through Lloret's recipes
items.longDescription: A quaint pizzeria near many of the town's hotels. The old adage doesn't apply to this place - it has both quality and quantity, especially when it comes to all the delicious types of homemade pizza!

items.title: Restaurant El Reno
items.shortDescription: In the mood for some fine dining? Visit El Reno
items.longDescription: A classy restaurant located on the road to the town of Blanes. Offers a large selection of high quality dishes, spread throughout several thematic courses. Booking required

items.title: Tequila 85
items.shortDescription: A cozy bar with a great selection of liquors
items.longDescription: Do you fancy a new experience for grown-ups? Then visit Tequila 85, a bar whose main objective is bringing great tastes and wonderful experiences to its visitors

categories.title: Live Music and Party Venues
categories.subtitle: Move your body! Come downtown and start grooving

items.title: Clon Festival
items.shortDescription: Relive the classics in a unique stage set by the sea
items.longDescription: Let us pay tribute to some of music's finest. A wondrous experience where you will travel back in time to a more carefree time

items.title: Grand Cafè Latino
items.shortDescription: The home of Southern rhythms
items.longDescription: Right in the heart of Lloret, you are more than welcome to visit and let the music guide you through the dance floor

items.title: Lloret Outdoor Summer Festival
items.shortDescription: Ditch the indoors and get out; it is summer after all
items.longDescription: Step aside from the bustling center and come to Fenals' beautiful gardens. A celebration of music for youngsters and adults alike

items.title: St. Trop'
items.shortDescription: Ever wondered what a Top 100 Worldwide club is like? You have come to the right place
items.longDescription: A massive venue, enthusiastic party-goers and great music? The night sure is young

items.title: Tropics
items.shortDescription: Not satisfied with a top 100 venue? Maybe a Top 25 will make the cut
items.longDescription: Come party to the sound of the best DJs in the world, featuring mainstream artists from a plethora of countries and musical styles

categories.title: Sports and Entertainment
categories.subtitle: A selection of physical and miscellanous activities and events

items.title: Globasket
items.shortDescription: Basketball tournament at its finest
items.longDescription: Watch exciting matches between teams from all over the world

items.title: Lloretrail
items.shortDescription: Challenge yourself in this race through nature
items.longDescription: A half marathon that will take you on a route through Lloret's beautiful landscapes.

items.title: Lloret Cup
items.shortDescription: Support the growing sport of handball
items.longDescription: Have a go at the amazing world of team handball in this international tournament

items.title: MICFootball
items.shortDescription: The world's game - right at home in Lloret!
items.longDescription: Have a go at the amazing world of team handball in this international tournament

items.title: Padel and Tennis
items.shortDescription: Do you like racket sports? Come and play!
items.longDescription: Multiple options at affordable prices, you can book whichever features you like

items.title: Paintball Aventura
items.shortDescription: Do you prefer something more extreme? Come join a game of paintball!
items.longDescription: An expansive area containing multiple obstacles and structures, everything that one needs for entertaining paintball matches

items.title: Rally Lloret de Mar
items.shortDescription: Pedal to the metal; experience the thrill of the race
items.longDescription: An event with rich history, bringing the rumbling sports cars to Lloret

items.title: Els Gegants de Lloret
items.shortDescription: Get to know this peculiar tradition
items.longDescription: Experience a centuries-old practice that embraces and celebrates the locals

items.title: Santa Cristina Festival
items.shortDescription: One of Lloret's two patron days
items.longDescription: Lloret's main summer festivity, featuring fireworks, live music, drone shows and more

items.title: Sant Pere del Bosc
items.shortDescription: A sanctuary in the middle of a Mediterranean forest
items.longDescription: A cultural heritage site that has lived through many of Lloret's eras. Doubles as a location for official cerimonies.

items.title: Sant Romà Festival
items.shortDescription: One of Lloret's two patron days
items.longDescription: The cold weather analog to the summer patron day. Characterized by the concurrent Medieval Fair
